properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Go labor on spend and be spent Thy joy to do the Father's will It is the way the Master went Should not the servant tread it still{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Go labor on 'tis not for naught Thy earthly loss is heav'nly gain Men heed thee love thee praise thee not The Master praises what are men{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Go labor on your hands are weak Your knees are faint your souls cast down Yet falter not - the prize you seek Is near a kingdom and a crown{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Go labor on while it is day The world's dark night is hastening on Speed speed thy work cast sloth away It is not thus that souls are won{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Men die in darkness at your side Without a hope to cheer the tomb Take up the torch and wave it wide The torch that lights time's thickest gloom{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Toil on faint not keep watch and pray Be wise the erring soul to win Go forth into the world's highway Compel the wand'rer to come in{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Toil on and in thy toil rejoice For toil comes rest for exile home Soon shalt Thou hear the Bridgroom's voice The midnight cry - Behold I come{/lang-eng}
